item.title: Introduction to Terraform
item.description: Terraform is tool for managing infrastructure. IaC or ‘Infrastructure as a code’ is process of managing you infrastrucutre with set of tools and human readable files instead of manually setting it in configuration tools. Installation Link to heading To use Terraform you need to install it. All necessary infromation can be found at official website.
